attacks.name: Damage Shift
attacks.effect: Move 1 damage counter from each of your Pokémon that has any on it to the Defending Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance.)

attacks.name: Water Spray
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 damage plus 20 more damage; if tails, this attack does 20 damage.
